rundown: 9-2 W @ Athletics Bryce Elder: 6.2 innings, 2 earned runs, 8 hits, 0 HR, 7 strikeouts Batters: Ronald Acuña Jr. (2 hits - 4 AB, 2 HR, 2 RBI) Drake Baldwin (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) Austin Riley (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) The Braves secured a convincing victory against the Athletics, showcasing a powerful offensive performance. Key highlights include Ronald Acuña Jr. hitting two home runs, contributing significantly to the score. Drake Baldwin and Austin Riley also made their mark with home runs and multiple RBIs. Bryce Elder delivered a solid pitching performance, striking out seven batters and limiting the Athletics to just two runs. The Braves' offense was relentless, accumulating 11 hits and scoring in multiple innings to dominate the game.
